page.title: 08WEATHER
page.content: ON THE 4 JULY on a programme called Midlands Today said that the village of Eyton Upon Turn was snowed in and that the only way that people could get about was by walking old people who could not walk very far got other people to walk about 5 miles to get food for then. Now that Summer is here tourists are here they are ruining the place they are trampling down all the farmers crops so they get a bad harvestin . In some places the was a green flag if the was a car under the snow . In some places the snow was about 10 foot deep . ALLthe roods to the village were blocked at one point.
